languages.text: "Потому что ты знаешь, что мои слова — правда. И Инцендия тоже прозрит тебя насквозь, отче. Тогда пощады не жди".
"Because you know that I speak the truth. And Incendia will see right through you as well, Reverend. And you know better than to hope she will be merciful."
languages.original_text: "Потому что ты знаешь, что мои слова — правда. И Инцендия тоже прозрит тебя насквозь, отче. Тогда пощады не жди".

traits.locale_text: "Because you know that my words are true. And Incendia will see right through you as well, Father. And you know better than to hope she will be merciful."
"Because you know that my words are true. And Incendia will see right through you as well, Father. And you know better than to hope she will be merciful."
"Because you know that I speak the truth. And Incendia will see right through you as well, Father. And you know better than to hope she will be merciful."
"Because you know that I speak the truth. And Incendia will see right through you as well, Father. And you know better than to hope she will be merciful."
"Because you know that I speak the truth. And Incendia will see right through you as well, Reverend. And you know better than to hope she will be merciful."
"Because you know that I speak the truth. And Incendia will see right through you as well, Reverend. And you know better than to hope she will be merciful."

languages.text: “因为你明白我说的是实话，而且因森蒂娅也会看穿你的伪装，牧师。你最好别指望她会对你手下留情。”
languages.original_text: "Because you know that I speak the truth. And Incendia will see right through you as well, Reverend. And you know better than to hope she will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: “因为你明白我说的是实话，而且因森蒂娅也会看穿你的伪装，神父。你最好别指望她会对你手下留情。”

languages.text: 「なぜなら{mf|俺|私}が真実を語っていることに気付いているからだ。司祭よ、インセンディアもそれに気付くだろう。そして、彼女が慈悲深くあることを願うより簡単な方法があることにも気付いているのだ」
languages.original_text: "Because you know that I speak the truth. And Incendia will see right through you as well, Reverend. And you know better than to hope she will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜなら{mf|俺|私}が真実を語っていることに気付いているからだ。司祭よ、インセンディアもそれに気付くだろう。そして、彼女が慈悲深くあることを願うより簡単な方法があることにも気付いているのだ」

languages.text: «Porque sabe que digo la verdad, e Incendia también será capaz de ver a través de usted, reverendo. Sabe que no puede esperar que sea misericordiosa».
languages.original_text: "Because you know that I speak the truth. And Incendia will see right through you as well, Reverend. And you know better than to hope she will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: «Porque sabe que digo la verdad, e Incendia también será capaz de ver a través de usted, padre. Sabe que no puede esperar que sea misericordiosa».

languages.text: "Weil Ihr wisst, dass ich die Wahrheit sage. Und Incendia wird Euch ebenfalls durchschauen, Reverend. Und Ihr wisst, dass sie gewiss keine Gnade zeigen wird."
languages.original_text: "Because you know that I speak the truth. And Incendia will see right through you as well, Reverend. And you know better than to hope she will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: "Weil Ihr wisst, dass ich die Wahrheit sage. Und Incendia wird Euch ebenfalls durchschauen, Vater. Und Ihr wisst, dass sie gewiss keine Gnade zeigen wird."

languages.text: « Parce que vous savez que je dis vrai. Incendia s'en rendra compte également, révérend, et vous avez parfaitement conscience qu'elle n'est pas encline à la miséricorde. »
languages.original_text: "Because you know that I speak the truth. And Incendia will see right through you as well, Reverend. And you know better than to hope she will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que vous savez que je dis vrai. Incendia s'en rendra compte également, mon père, et vous avez parfaitement conscience qu'elle n'est pas encline à la miséricorde. »

languages.text: "Çünkü doğruyu söylediğimi biliyorsun. İncendia da bu sırrını açıkça görecektir Muhterem. Merhametli davranacağını ummak ne derece doğru olur, sen daha iyi biliyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Because you know that I speak the truth. And Incendia will see right through you as well, Reverend. And you know better than to hope she will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü doğruyu söylediğimi biliyorsun ve İncendia da bu sırrını açıkça görecektir Muhterem. Merhametli davranacağını ummak ne derece doğru olur, sen daha iyi biliyorsun."
